snippet: West Ham United rejected bids from Chinese Super League clubs for striker Andy Carroll, manager Slaven Bilic has confirmed, saying the Premier League side have no plans to sell one of their "best players"....

headline.main: Karanka Does Not Fear Sack, Focussed on Middlesbrough Survival
headline.print_headline: Karanka Does Not Fear Sack, Focussed on Middlesbrough Survival

lead_paragraph: West Ham United rejected bids from Chinese Super League clubs for striker Andy Carroll, manager Slaven Bilic has confirmed, saying the Premier League side have no plans to sell one of their "best players".
